description: Gets the configuration of an app, such as platform version and bitness, default documents, virtual applications, Always On, etc.

resource_group_name.description: Name of the resource group to which the resource belongs.

subscription_id.description: Your Azure subscription ID. This is a GUID-formatted string (e.g. 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000).

slot.description: Name of the deployment slot. If a slot is not specified, the API will return configuration for the production slot.
